Text: The new edition of the Euromoney Capital Markets DirectoryDear Ms Shackleton The launch date of the Euromoney Capital Markets Directory is approaching fast and I am taking this opportunity to invite you to reserve your copy of the directory The Euromoney Capital Markets Directory has been the definitive contact resource for the financial markets over the past years The directory is the best way to find the names and contact details of CEOs Heads of Departments Traders Compliance Officer and Marketing Manager in financial institutions around the world Now for the first time you can purchase The Euromoney Capital Markets Directory separately or as part of The Euromoney Financial Markets Box Set New for the box set extends coverage to include the Capital Markets and Commercial and Private Banking The Financial Markets Box Set includes The Euromoney Capital Markets Directory both in print and on the Internet remains the definitive contact resource for the capital markets covering some people It provides you with telephone and fax numbers email and postal addresses The Euromoney Directory of Commercial Private Banking completes the picture of global wholesale banking Coverage extends from senior banking executives to heads of corporate banking loan officers trade finance as well as administrative roles The Financial Markets Index is a reference resource that enables you to locate the contacts in the first two volumes quickly and easily along with a guide to services offered by banks by country UPDATED EVERYDAY ONLINE Subscribers receive not only the print editions of these directories but also get direct access to our online databases which means that they benefit from our team of professional researchers who work constantly updating and expanding the directories all year round SPECIAL OFFER As a user of the Euromoneycom we are offering you the chance to save off the cost of the Euromoney Financial Markets Box Set or The Euromoney Capital Markets Directory by prepaying with your credit card The Euromoney Financial Markets Box Set costs UK or US and includes months access to the Capital Markets Private Banking and Commercial Banking Directories online The Euromoney Capital Markets Directory on its own costs UK or US and includes months access to the Capital Markets Directory online There are three simple ways of ordering You can order on line by going wwwfinancialdirectoriescom Or you can simply reply to this email stating you wish to place an order Or by phone you can call our client hotline on in the UK or in the USA If you require any further information please feel free to reply to this email or call us on in the UK or in the USA Sincere regards Chris Brown President Institutional Investor inc JBVIMAAA If you do not wish to be contacted again please send a reply to this email and simply write unsubscribe
